DOC.brief_title: Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To test feasibility deliver hypofractionated intensity-modulated radiotherapy prostate pelvic node patient prostate cancer . - To determine optimal dose level treatment regimen use future study . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord small bowel total volume ( low small bowel volume < 450 cc v high small bowel volume ≥ 450 cc ) . Patients undergo hypofractionated intensity-modulated radiotherapy prostate pelvis 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 6 month 5 year annually thereafter .
